tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stem_cell_transplantation_progress (
  patient_id INT,
  procedure_date DATE,
  success_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE StemCellTransplantationDetails(
    donor_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    transplantation_date TIMESTAMP,
    success_rate DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (donor_id, recipient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TransplantationOutcomes(
    patient_id INT,
    transplantation_id INT,
    outcome VARCHAR(50),
    progress_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transplantation_id) REFERENCES StemCellTransplantationDetails(donor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StemCellTransplantation (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  donor_id INT,
  transplantation_date DATE,
  success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Donors (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE stem_cell_patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  transplantation_date DATE,
  success_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE transplantations (
  transplantation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  donor_id INT,
  center_id INT,
  transplantation_date DATE,
  success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE complications (
  complication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  transplantation_id INT,
  complication_description TEXT,
  resolution VARCHAR(50)
);
